page.title: 14Kirkconnel:The Gala
page.content: Like many villages and towns with a mining connection we have an annual Gala (pronounced as in alarm) The week-long celebration in the middle of June includes sports, cycle races,five-a-side football,talent contest,fashion show,fire-works etc., and culminates on the Saturday with a parade of floats,which this year numbered 20, bands and people in fancy dress.When the parade has toured the village it makes for Riverside Park, the home of Kello Rovers....the local Junior League F.C., where a picnic is held and various entertainments are enjoyed.First however the Crowning of the Gala Queen takes place. Each year a new queen is elected from and by the senior girls in the local Primary School.She is supported by two attendants and a page.
